title: Greg Olsen Interview, Carolina Contenders, Cutler vs. Kaepernick (Football 11/15)
description:
Will Brinson, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora compare Jay Cutler and Colin Kaepernick and contemplate if Carolina can contend. Then it's 'Hot Take or Just Right' featuring questions like; are the Giants the worst team in the NFL, is Blake Bortles good enough to win a Super Bowl, without Ezekiel Elliott, Dak Prescott is simply average, and much more! Then, Will is joined by Panthers TE Greg Olsen to discuss his health, Cam Newton's progression, his assessment of the Panthers while watching on the sideline, and a great new charitable initiative that Greg started in Charlotte.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
